pages/custom/page/alkaline:
{{#partial "page"}} {{inject 'carouselDelay' carousel.swap_frequency}} {{inject 'youTubeUrl' ''}} {{inject 'youTubePoster' 'https://www.trailerenvy.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/06/water.jpg'}}
{{{page.content}}}

Remove Harmful Toxins by Filtering Your Water

Santevia’s filtration products remove harmful contaminants from your drinking water. Learn more about what you might be encountering in your water supply below:
Pharmaceuticals

Tap water supplies have shown levels of prescription drugs including hormones, antibiotics, and more
Chlorine By-Products

Though chlorine is a disinfectant, its resulting effects can lead to illness and the bad taste associated with tap water
Bacteria

As resistance develops, bacteria can surpass residential filtration systems and be found in city water supplies
Heavy Metals

Plumbing can contain lead and other metals that enters water before being consumed
SHOP NOW

Restore H2O to it’s Fullest Natural State with Steps of Filtration & Mineralization

Santevia’s one-of-a-kind filtration systems mimics the natural process of mineralization to create perfectly balanced alkaline water. Each step works towards re-engineering water to it’s truest, nutrient-rich form:

1

Ceramic Pre-Filter

2

NSF Certified Activated Alumina (Fluoride Reduction)

3

NSF Certified Granular Activated Coconut Carbon

4

pH Mineral Balls

5

Mineral Stone Infusion

6

Natural Silica Sand

7

Mineral Stones

8

Magnetic Energizer

Filters rust, sediments, bacteria, parasites.

Reduces fluoride up to 100%. Activated alumina is currently the best fluoride filter media available for gravity water systems. This filter media also reduces low levels of arsenic.

Activated carbon from coconut shells reduces chlorine, herbicides, pharmaceuticals, industrial chemicals, tri-halomethanes, heavy metals, organic chemicals, particulates, and improves odour and taste. Kinetic Degradation Fluxion (KDF) reduces chlorine, inhibits growth of bacteria and mold, and neutralizes heavy metals.

Increases pH, adds calcium, magnesium, and other beneficial trace minerals.

Porous Maifan stones help oxygenate the water, add dissolved minerals and restore alkalinity.

Acts as a second filter and polishes the water, initiating optimal pH balance.

Energy Balls: Assist in stabilizing pH and break down large clusters of water molecules for better absorption.

Maifan Stones: Adds calcium, iron, magnesium, potassium, zinc and other trace minerals. It helps maintain pH balance after filtering.

Aligned magnets activate, realign and energize water molecules for greater absorption.

SHOP NOW

Your Purchase Helps Others

Santevia donates 5% of profits to help fund two orphanages in Thailand, a school in the slums of Bangladesh, water projects in Africa and Haiti, an orphanage farming project in Indonesia, and numerous healthy living projects in North America.

LEARN MORE

components/common/theme-object:
<script>
  Theme = {};

  Theme.version = '1.1.12';
  Theme.shopName = '{{settings.store_name}}';

  Theme.carousel = {
    delay: '{{carousel.swap_frequency}}'
  };

  Theme.localization = {
    cart: {
      outOfStock: '{{lang "cart.out_of_stock"}}',
      errorMessageGeneral: '{{lang "cart.error"}}',
      itemsInCart: '{{lang "header.view_cart"}}'
    },
    product: {
      addSuccess: '{{lang "product.success"}}',
      outOfStock: '{{lang "product.error_message_stock"}}',
      zeroQuantity: '{{lang "product.error_zero_quantity"}}',
      errorMessageGeneral: '{{lang "product.error_message_general"}}',
      cartLink: '{{lang "product.cart_link"}}',
      homeLink: '{{lang "product.home_link"}}',
      checkoutLink: '{{lang "product.checkout_link"}}',
      addToCart: '{{lang "product.add_to_cart"}}',
      preOrder: '{{lang "product.pre_order"}}',
      soldOut: '{{lang "product.sold_out"}}'
    },
    urls: {
      cart: '{{urls.cart}}',
      checkout: '{{urls.checkout.single_address}}'
    }
  }

  Theme.messages = {
    cart: {
      "remove_item": "{{lang 'cart.checkout.remove_confirm'}}"
    },
    contact_us_errors: {
      "email": "{{lang 'forms.contact_us.errors.email'}}",
      "message": "{{lang 'forms.contact_us.errors.message'}}"
    }
  }
</script>
